languages.text: "Воистину, Вольные Торговцы обречены вечно враждовать друг с другом. Такова сила яда амбиций, проистекающего из наших Патентов".
"Indeed, Rogue Traders are doomed to forever feud with one other. Such is the power of that poison called ambition that seeps from our Warrants."
languages.original_text: "Воистину, Вольные Торговцы обречены вечно враждовать друг с другом. Такова сила яда амбиций, проистекающего из наших Патентов".

traits.locale_text: "Indeed, the Rogue Traders are doomed to forever feud with one other. Such is the power of ambition stemming from our Warrants, and its name is poison."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: "Indeed, the Rogue Traders are doomed to forever feud with one other. Such is the power of ambition stemming from our Warrants, and its name is poison."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: "Indeed, the Rogue Traders are doomed to forever feud with one other. Such is the power of ambition stemming from our Warrants and its name is poison."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: "Indeed, the Rogue Traders are doomed to forever feud with one other. Such is the power of ambition stemming from our Warrants and its name is poison."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: "Indeed, Rogue Traders are doomed to forever feud with one other. Such is the power of that poison called ambition that seeps from our Warrants."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: "Indeed, Rogue Traders are doomed to forever feud with one other. Such is the power of that poison called ambition that seeps from our Warrants."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: « C'est vrai, les libres-marchands sont condamnés à s'affronter pour l'éternité. C'est le pouvoir de l'ambition, ce poison qui imprègne nos lettres de marque. »
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Rogue Traders are doomed to forever feud with one other. Such is the power of that poison called ambition that seeps from our Warrants."

traits.locale_text: « C'est vrai, les libres-marchands sont condamnés à s'affronter pour l'éternité. C'est le pouvoir de l'ambition que nous donnent nos lettres de marque, et c'est un poison. »
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: «Efectivamente, los Comerciantes Independientes estamos condenados a luchar entre nosotros. Es el efecto del veneno llamado ambición que encierra la Patente».
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Rogue Traders are doomed to forever feud with one other. Such is the power of that poison called ambition that seeps from our Warrants."

traits.locale_text: «Efectivamente, los Comerciantes Independientes estamos condenados a luchar entre nosotros. Es el poder que otorga la Patente: un auténtico veneno».
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: “确实如此，行商浪人之间注定要争战不休，因为这就是野心的力量。它源自我们的授状，像毒药一样毒害我们。”
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Rogue Traders are doomed to forever feud with one other. Such is the power of that poison called ambition that seeps from our Warrants."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此，行商浪人之间注定要争战不休，因为这就是野心的力量。这种野心源自我们的许可证，它就像毒药一样毒害我们。”
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: 「自由開拓者は永遠に反目しあう運命にある。野心という名の毒は、我々の令状から染み出てくるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Rogue Traders are doomed to forever feud with one other. Such is the power of that poison called ambition that seeps from our Warrants."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者は永遠に反目しあう運命にある。野心という名の毒は、我々の令状から染み出てくるのだ」
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: "Oh ja, die Freihändler sind dazu verdammt, ewig Fehden gegeneinander zu führen. Das ist die Macht des Giftes namens Ehrgeiz, das aus unseren Handelsbriefen erwächst."
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Rogue Traders are doomed to forever feud with one other. Such is the power of that poison called ambition that seeps from our Warrants."

traits.locale_text: "Oh ja, die Freihändler sind dazu verdammt, ewig Fehden gegeneinander zu führen. Das ist die Macht des Ehrgeizes, die aus unseren Handelsbriefen erwächst, und sie heißt Gift."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: "Çok doğru. Hür Tacirler, sonsuza dek birbirleriyle kavga etmeye mahkûmdur. Ruhsatnamelerimizden gelen ve azim denen zehrin gücü bunu gerektirir."
languages.original_text: "Indeed, Rogue Traders are doomed to forever feud with one other. Such is the power of that poison called ambition that seeps from our Warrants."
